overview: Reach Out --- Definitive Performances 1965-1973 showcases, for the first time on DVD, 22 Legendary Performances by the hit-making Motown group.  From rare local television clips to celebrated appearance on the national stage, this collection offers a stunning array of classic Motown music, with remastered sound and video --- including the option to experience the Four Tops like never before and hear unreleased a cappella mixes of such songs as "Reach Out I" BeTher, " Baby I Need Your Loving" and more, taken directly from their original Motown session reels.  As an extra special bonus, newly shot interviews with Duke Fakir, Roquel Payton, Smokey Robinson and Mickey Stevenson, as well as vintage interviews with the rest of the group, are highlighted throughout, documenting the one-of-a-kind story of this Motown supergroup.
title: The Four Tops: Reach Out
